snippet: The pair lured the man to Britain with promises of a job, then made him work for free by threatening him with deportation if he tried to escape, prosecutors said.
abstract: British couple is convicted on slavery charges for keeping Nigerian man captive and forcing him to work since 1989.
lead_paragraph: The pair lured the man to Britain with promises of a job, then made him work for free by threatening him with deportation if he tried to escape, prosecutors said.

headline.main: Britain: Couple Found Guilty of Keeping a Nigerian Man Captive Since 1989
headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: Couple Found Guilty of Keeping a Nigerian Man Captive Since 1989
